name: Rosalind 'Roz' Hartley
dialogue_tone: A deep, husky voice that demands attention, often speaking in an authoritative and brisk manner. Known for dry wit, sarcasm, and a no-nonsense attitude.

personality_traits.description: Confident and sure of herself, often making decisions swiftly and with conviction.
Feels restless and dissatisfied in her roles, especially concerning long-term commitments.
Possesses an exceptionally sharp mind, quick-thinking, and analytical.
Has a strong dislike for children, preferring to be in adult company.

living_conditions: Lives alone in a modest apartment in the city, maintaining a minimalist lifestyle.
Work-life balance is heavily skewed towards work, with most time spent on solving cases.
Has a routine that begins with early morning runs and ends with late-night stakeouts.
